channel.title: Cant run server
channel.description:
well ive succesfully made the compiler, but when i try and run the server i get a error saying
"java" is not reconised as a internal or external command, opertatable program or batch file.
can somebody give me a new runserver code or tell me what to do?
edit - this is my current runserver
@echo off title Pimpscape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 02:55:38 AM[/size][hr]help please[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 03:01:30 AM[/size][hr]help me please

item.title: Cant run server

title Pimpscape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 02:55:38 AM[/size][hr]help please[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 03:01:30 AM[/size][hr]help me please[/quote]

you either need to download javaJDK OR JAVA GO 2 WWW.JAVA.COM
